description: On a cool morning, somewhere in the rolling hills of Northern California, Elijah White is waking up.  But he set his alarm way too early. While looking at old memories, he comes across a photo of two boys Elijah had the luck to hook up with a few months back.  It's Cody Cachet and Mike King. He's remembering Mike's eager mouth as it slurped his big, hard cock, and Cody's tight asshole while Elijah fucked him in the upstairs bathroom at Mike's grandmother's house after they all had finished a swim together on a sweltering, summer day.  But what Elijah remembers best is the feel of both boys warm cum shooting out of their powerful dicks and sticking to his face.Enjoy!
series: NDT - 8098 - Elijah White, Cody Cachet & Mike King
